comment.author: 52820945@N03
comment._content: Me llama la atencion que en este tipo de fotos la gente no sonríe. Era mucho mas seria que hoy dia.

comment.author: 37547255@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/52820945@N03] Yes, that's true. Going to the photographer was a much more serious affair back then. Exposure times were also longer, so people were very focused on remaining motionless when being photographed.
